name: Das Boot
summary_text: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

name: Scary Movie
summary_text: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

name: Bad Boys II
summary_text: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
summary_text: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

name: The Descendants
summary_text: A land baron tries to reconnect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.

name: Aladdin
summary_text: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

name: Elf
summary_text: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

name: The Bucket List
summary_text: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

name: Sucker Punch
summary_text: A young girl institutionalized by her abusive stepfather retreats to an alternative reality as a coping strategy and envisions a plan to help her escape.

name: The Artist
summary_text: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

name: Soul
summary_text: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

name: Megamind
summary_text: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

name: Final Destination
summary_text: Alex Browning is among a group of high school students readying themselves for a trip to Europe. When he suddenly has a premonition their airplane will crash, he screams to warn the others but instead he is thrown off of the plane.

name: Spy
summary_text: A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.

name: The Reader
summary_text: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

name: Chappie
summary_text: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.
"21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

name: Alien: Resurrection
summary_text: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
summary_text: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

name: War for the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

name: Uncut Gems
summary_text: With his debts mounting and angry collectors closing in, a fast-talking New York City jeweler risks everything in hope of staying afloat and alive.

name: Star Trek Beyond
summary_text: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.

name: Grown Ups
summary_text: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

name: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
summary_text: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

name: Don Jon
summary_text: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

name: BlacKkKlansman
summary_text: Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer from Colorado Springs, CO, successfully manages to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan branch with the help of a Jewish surrogate who eventually becomes its leader. Based on actual events.

name: First Blood
summary_text: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

name: Valkyrie
summary_text: A dramatization of the July 20, 1944 assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Adolf Hitler during World War II.

name: End of Watch
summary_text: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

name: Lawless
summary_text: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

name: The Fountain
summary_text: As a modern-day scientist, Tommy is struggling with mortality, desperately searching for the medical breakthrough that will save the life of his cancer-stricken wife, Izzi.

name: Eastern Promises
summary_text: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

name: Identity
summary_text: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

name: The Conjuring 2
summary_text: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

name: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
summary_text: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

name: Escape Plan
summary_text: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

name: Enemy of the State
summary_text: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

name: Bridget Jones's Diary
summary_text: Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

name: The Boondock Saints
summary_text: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

name: I Am Number Four
summary_text: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

name: Hotel Transylvania
summary_text: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

name: The Great Escape
summary_text: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

name: Don't Breathe
summary_text: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

name: The Tourist
summary_text: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

name: Philadelphia
summary_text: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
summary_text: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

name: Pitch Black
summary_text: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.

name: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
summary_text: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

name: Amores Perros
summary_text: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
summary_text: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

name: 21 Grams
summary_text: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

name: The Intern
summary_text: Seventy-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.

name: A History of Violence
summary_text: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

name: Ender's Game
summary_text: Young Ender Wiggin is recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, an insectoid alien race who had previously tried to invade Earth and had inflicted heavy losses on humankind.

name: The Beach
summary_text: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

name: The Road
summary_text: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

name: Ghost Rider
summary_text: When motorcycle rider Johnny Blaze sells his soul to the Devil to save his father's life, he is transformed into the Ghost Rider, the Devil's own bounty hunter, and is sent to hunt down sinners.

name: Sinister
summary_text: Washed-up true crime writer Ellison Oswalt finds a box of super 8 home movies in his new home that suggest the murder that he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose work dates back to the 1960s.

name: The Lobster
summary_text: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.

name: Just Go with It
summary_text: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

name: Me, Myself & Irene
summary_text: A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

name: A Separation
summary_text: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
summary_text: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

name: The Lone Ranger
summary_text: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

name: The Elephant Man
summary_text: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

name: Disturbia
summary_text: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

name: Focus
summary_text: In the midst of veteran con man Nicky's latest scheme, a woman from his past - now an accomplished femme fatale - shows up and throws his plans for a loop.

name: Knowing
summary_text: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

name: Paranormal Activity
summary_text: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

name: Ben-Hur
summary_text: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

name: Singin' in the Rain
summary_text: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

name: Role Models
summary_text: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

name: Modern Times
summary_text: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

name: Call Me by Your Name
summary_text: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

name: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
summary_text: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

name: Southpaw
summary_text: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

name: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
summary_text: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

name: Warm Bodies
summary_text: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

name: Stranger Than Fiction
summary_text: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

name: Rambo
summary_text: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

name: Mamma Mia!
summary_text: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.

name: Natural Born Killers
summary_text: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

name: The Passion of the Christ
summary_text: Depicts the final twelve hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth, on the day of his crucifixion in Jerusalem.

name: Gandhi
summary_text: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

name: Mr. Nobody
summary_text: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

name: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
summary_text: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

name: Transcendence
summary_text: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his own consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

name: The Adventures of Tintin
summary_text: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

name: Lion
summary_text: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

name: The Lincoln Lawyer
summary_text: A lawyer defending a wealthy man begins to believe his client is guilty of more than just one crime.

name: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
summary_text: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

name: Chicago
summary_text: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

name: Airplane!
summary_text: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

name: Meet Joe Black
summary_text: Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.

name: Murder on the Orient Express
summary_text: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

name: The Lion King
summary_text: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
summary_text: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

name: RoboCop
summary_text: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy, a loving husband, father and good cop, is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

name: Old School
summary_text: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
summary_text: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

name: The Ides of March
summary_text: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

name: No Strings Attached
summary_text: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

name: San Andreas
summary_text: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

name: The Chronicles of Riddick
summary_text: The wanted criminal Richard Bruno Riddick (Vin Diesel) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

name: Shakespeare in Love
summary_text: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

name: Body of Lies
summary_text: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

name: Cube
summary_text: Six complete strangers with widely varying personalities are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

name: Minions
summary_text: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

name: Silent Hill
summary_text: A woman, Rose, goes in search for her adopted daughter within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill.

name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
summary_text: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days.

name: Midsommar
summary_text: A couple travels to Scandinavia to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

name: It Chapter Two
summary_text: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

name: Munich
summary_text: Based on the true story of the Black September aftermath, about the five men chosen to eliminate the ones responsible for that fateful day.

name: Me Before You
summary_text: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

name: Thank You for Smoking
summary_text: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his 12-year old son.

name: It Follows
summary_text: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

name: Glass
summary_text: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities.

name: Predators
summary_text: A group of elite warriors parachute into an unfamiliar jungle and are hunted by members of a merciless alien race.

name: Romeo + Juliet
summary_text: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

name: Yip Man
summary_text: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

name: Clerks
summary_text: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

name: Wind River
summary_text: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

name: Mars Attacks!
summary_text: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

name: Game Night
summary_text: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

name: Planet of the Apes
summary_text: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

name: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale
summary_text: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.

name: Jason Bourne
summary_text: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

name: Toy Story 4
summary_text: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

name: Life
summary_text: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
summary_text: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

name: The Sound of Music
summary_text: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
summary_text: The monstrous spirit of a slain child murderer seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

name: Hercules
summary_text: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

name: True Romance
summary_text: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

name: Rio
summary_text: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

name: Cowboys & Aliens
summary_text: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

name: Dogma
summary_text: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
summary_text: The Madagascar animals fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African nature reserve, where they meet others of their own kind, and Alex especially discovers his royal heritage as prince of a lion pride.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
summary_text: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

name: The Fate of the Furious
summary_text: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism and a betrayal of those closest to him, the crew face trials that will test them as never before.

name: Safe House
summary_text: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

name: White House Down
summary_text: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

name: Match Point
summary_text: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

name: Daredevil
summary_text: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

name: Dirty Dancing
summary_text: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

name: Hell or High Water
summary_text: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

name: Garden State
summary_text: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.

name: Gangster Squad
summary_text: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

name: Die Another Day
summary_text: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

name: Let the Right One In
summary_text: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

name: Tarzan
summary_text: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

name: Ghostbusters: Answer the Call
summary_text: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

name: The Ugly Truth
summary_text: An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.

name: Your Name.
summary_text: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

name: The Great Dictator
summary_text: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
summary_text: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.

name: Rocky Balboa
summary_text: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
summary_text: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

name: Get Smart
summary_text: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.

name: Hidden Figures
summary_text: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

name: Closer
summary_text: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

name: Anger Management
summary_text: Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

name: The Purge
summary_text: A wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legal.

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
summary_text: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Sunset Blvd.
summary_text: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

name: American Reunion
summary_text: Jim, Michelle, Stifler, and their friends reunite in East Great Falls, Michigan for their high school reunion.

name: The Impossible
summary_text: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

name: Ad Astra
summary_text: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.

name: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
summary_text: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

name: The Descent
summary_text: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

name: The Girl Next Door
summary_text: A teenager's dreams come true when a former porn star moves in next door and they fall in love.

name: Carlito's Way
summary_text: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
summary_text: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

name: Pain & Gain
summary_text: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

name: Blade II
summary_text: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

name: The Karate Kid
summary_text: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

name: Big Daddy
summary_text: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

name: Big
summary_text: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

name: Gremlins
summary_text: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary_text: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

name: Rush Hour 2
summary_text: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for a vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

name: Everest
summary_text: The story of New Zealand's Robert "Rob" Edwin Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.

name: Happy Gilmore
summary_text: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

name: P.S. I Love You
summary_text: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

name: Planet Terror
summary_text: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

name: A Walk to Remember
summary_text: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

name: Coraline
summary_text: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

name: Napoleon Dynamite
summary_text: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

name: A Fistful of Dollars
summary_text: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
summary_text: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

name: Ghost
summary_text: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

name: Remember the Titans
summary_text: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

name: The Babadook
summary_text: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled "Mister Babadook" manifests in their home.

name: Oz the Great and Powerful
summary_text: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

name: Revolutionary Road
summary_text: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

name: Finding Neverland
summary_text: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

name: Chef
summary_text: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

name: A Good Day to Die Hard
summary_text: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
summary_text: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

name: 2 Guns
summary_text: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

name: Death Race
summary_text: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

name: Ghost in the Shell
summary_text: In the near future, Major Mira Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

name: When Harry Met Sally...
summary_text: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

name: You've Got Mail
summary_text: Book superstore magnate, Joe Fox and independent book shop owner, Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
summary_text: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

name: EuroTrip
summary_text: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

name: Traffic
summary_text: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

name: Austin Powers in Goldmember
summary_text: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

name: Wonder Woman 1984
summary_text: Diana must contend with a work colleague and businessman, whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

name: Rosemary's Baby
summary_text: A young couple trying for a baby move into a fancy apartment surrounded by peculiar neighbors.

name: The Happening
summary_text: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

name: Jumanji: The Next Level
summary_text: In Jumanji: The Next Level, the gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
summary_text: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

name: Sleepers
summary_text: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

name: The Croods
summary_text: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

name: Captain Fantastic
summary_text: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

name: The Secret in Their Eyes
summary_text: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

name: American Wedding
summary_text: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.

name: Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters
summary_text: Brother-sister duo Hansel and Gretel are professional witch hunters who help innocent villagers. But they soon stumble upon a case that could hold the key to their past.

name: Dracula
summary_text: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

name: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
summary_text: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

name: I Love You, Man
summary_text: Friendless Peter Klaven goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But, when his insta-bond with his new B.F.F. puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée, can the trio learn to live happily ever after?

name: Mother!
summary_text: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

name: Rocky II
summary_text: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

name: Bad Teacher
summary_text: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job, her students, and her co-workers is forced to return to teaching to make enough money for breast implants after her wealthy fiancé dumps her.

name: Orphan
summary_text: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

name: The Number 23
summary_text: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him, as more and more similarities between himself and his literary alter ego seem to arise.

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
summary_text: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

name: Mad Max
summary_text: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

name: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
summary_text: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

name: Tomb Raider
summary_text: Lara Croft (Alicia Vikander), the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft (Dominic West) disappeared.

name: Coming to America
summary_text: An extremely pampered African prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and strong will.

name: What Women Want
summary_text: A cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

name: Blue Jasmine
summary_text: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...

name: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
summary_text: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

name: Primal Fear
summary_text: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

name: Transporter 2
summary_text: Transporter Frank Martin, surfaces in Miami, Florida and is implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

name: Bolt
summary_text: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

name: After Earth
summary_text: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

name: The Raid: Redemption
summary_text: A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

name: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
summary_text: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

name: Ocean's Eight
summary_text: Debbie Ocean gathers an all-female crew to attempt an impossible heist at New York City's yearly Met Gala.

name: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
summary_text: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman runs from his captors, the law, and his past.

name: The Hitman's Bodyguard
summary_text: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

name: Hanna
summary_text: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

name: The Internship
summary_text: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.

name: Underworld: Evolution
summary_text: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

name: Machete
summary_text: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

name: Miss Congeniality
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

name: Project X
summary_text: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.
